tql.tql:
SELECT * FROM aws_cloudwatch_logs.list_log_groups
  WHERE logGroupName = "/aws/ecs/stage/web"

/*
 * For sample code and reference material, visit
 * https://www.transposit.com/docs/get-started/sql-quickstart
 */

SELECT logStreamName FROM aws_cloudwatch_logs.list_log_streams
  WHERE logGroupName="/aws/ecs/stage/web"
  AND orderBy="LastEventTime"
  AND descending=TRUE
  LIMIT 1

SELECT * FROM aws_cloudwatch_logs.filter_log_events
  WHERE logGroupName="/aws/ecs/" + @instance + "/web"
  AND filterPattern='"' + @requestId + '"'
  AND logStreamNames=(SELECT ["eef27ec0b2de1151e06871fcd657168319e0975d357db5d00da9e4f9b39fe07a"])
